meanings.definition: The flat surface of a table.
meanings.sent1: The tabletops in the classroom were shiny and smooth.
meanings.sent2: We gathered around the tabletops for our group project.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat loved to jump on the tabletops and knock things off.
meanings.sent4: The tabletops in the cafe were like blank canvases waiting to be filled with delicious food.
meanings.sent5: The sunlight reflected off the tabletops, creating a warm and inviting atmosphere.

meanings.definition: To place something on a table.
meanings.sent1: She carefully tabletops the vase in the center of the dining table.
meanings.sent2: Please tabletops the books neatly before we start the meeting.
meanings.sent3: He tabletops the keys on the kitchen counter, always in the same spot.
meanings.sent4: The chef tabletops the finished dishes with a sprinkle of fresh herbs.
meanings.sent5: They tabletops the board game pieces strategically to start the game.
